entities.name: peeves
entities.description: Peeves is a poltergeist who seems hacked off about something. He wreaks havoc and mayhem in the kitchens, causing pots and pans to be everywhere and the house-elves to be terrified.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is a student who expresses his concern about Peeves' behavior.

entities.name: nearly headless nick
entities.description: Nearly Headless Nick is a ghost and a house-elf who seems to be in charge of the house-elves at Hogwarts. He describes Peeves' behavior as 'the usual'.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a student who expresses horror and surprise upon learning that there are house-elves at Hogwarts.

relationships.description: Peeves wreaks havoc and mayhem in the kitchens, causing pots and pans to be everywhere and the house-elves to be terrified. Nearly Headless Nick describes Peeves' behavior as 'the usual'.
Ron expresses his concern about Peeves' behavior, saying that he seems hacked off about something.
Hermione learns from Nearly Headless Nick that there are house-elves at Hogwarts, and she expresses horror and surprise.
